issue.title: [JS] Use feature enum in javascript
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9311](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9311). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9311?focusedCommentId=17476934) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Can you add a description for this issue?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9311?focusedCommentId=17487632) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
There was a [Feature enum](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/format/Schema.fbs#L67) added to schema.fbs in the hope of guarding forwards compatible changes.  This Jira was to make use of this in Javascript (I don't think any implementation has done any work here yet).
